dct_title_s: Map of the Inside Beach and Sand Hills Beach sections of Absecon Island, New Jersey
dct_description_sm: Land grant map from the late 1870's describing transactions of beach front property. This map depicts the Inside Beach and Sand Hills Beach sections of what is now known as Absecon Island, encompassing Chelsea Heights in Atlantic City, Ventnor Heights and other portions of Ventnor City, a portion of Margate City, and all of Longport Borough.
Title: Map has no title; title is created
Name of Old Lafayette Island on Map is ambiguous
Note on map states date of copy; unknown whether the map was originally created on that date or copied
